5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Imran bin Husain said:“I suffered from Nasur* and I asked the Prophet (ﷺ) about prayer. He said: ‘Perform prayer standing; if you cannot, then sitting; and if you cannot then while lying on your side.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْمَرِيضِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the Prayer of a sick person
